content.rendered:
Click on the title to play video

    • When Should the HOA Documents Be Obtained for a Condominium Sale?
    • What could happen if the Seller does not disclose on the new Seller’s Disclosure Notice?
    • Extending option periods – does Buyer have to pay something for the extension?
    • Changes to the Addendum Concerning Right to Terminate Due to Lender’s Appraisal
    • Smart Homes: Tip for Handling Issues Involving “Smart” Homes
    • Temporary Residential Lease- When the Seller Vacates Early
    • Seller’s Disclosure Notice and Beneficiary Responsibility to Complete
    • What you need to know about electronic closings.
    • What does it mean when the contract calls for possession upon closing and funding?
    • Suggestion on how to handle non-realty items in a contract.
    • North Texan Buying First Home Scammed Out of 45K, 9-27-2019
    • Release of Earnest Money Under Sale of Other Property, 09-19-2019
    • A Message From Dawn
    • A Tip for Special Provisions, 9-5-2019
    • New Seller’s Disclosure Notice effective September 1, 2019, 8-28-2019
    • Should Remote Controlled Light Bulbs and Nest Thermostat Controls be addressed in the contract?
    • Agents Beware! Fraudsters are using phishing emails designed to look like they are from your closer to obtain personal information.
    • How Not to Fall Prey to Wire Fraud, August 8, 2019
    • Does the non-realty item addendum need to contain a dollar amount to make it a binding agreement on the seller? August 1, 2019
    • What happens when the title company is not ready to close? July 25, 2019
    • Does missing the closing date kill the contract?, July 18, 2019
    • What is the impact of the words “time is of the essence” in the contract? 6-27-2019
    • Notice of Buyer’s Termination of Contract, 7-11-2019
